info.marque: Update v1.4.1 is available on our discord, telegram or simply from the settings.
info.Changelogs:
Update ver1.4.1 changelogs
1-notifications delayed by 8 hours in order not to spam users
2-fixed restore and backup for androids 10 and above
3-fixes the bug showing airing anime completed
4-more server fixes


Update ver1.4.0 changelogs
1-improved loading times when accessing libraries
2-added ability to backup and restore data without syncing
            
3-fixes the bug airing anime but not showing episodes
4-fixes crashes after existing defaultplayer
5-Alpha player has been removed
        
6-added auto detect and switching to a working server
7-added more servers
8-ui changed
9-added recap and missing episodes
        
10-added integrated downloader manager, please NOTE this is still in BETA and may contains some bugs


-Todo list
1-further enhance download manager-threaded download
        
2-adding mal sync functionality
3-improve the ui and themes visuals
4-fixing lags in some devices.
